Module com.example.pizasson
Package com.example.pizasson.Controller

Class SplashScreenController

java.lang.Object
com.example.pizasson.Controller.SplashScreenController
public class SplashScreenController extends Object
This class is in charge of controlling the display of the splash screen. The class controls the display of the icon and the title of the restaurant
Author:
Santiago Caballero

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    animateIcon()
    This method modifies an animation with the icon just to give style to the splash screen
    private void
    createImgIconView()
    the method imports the icon from the files, assigns to an ImageView to be displayed
    private javafx.scene.image.ImageView
    createTitleImgView()
    This method imports the title image, assigns it to a ImageView to be displayed on the screen
    void
    initialize()
    This method initialize the splashscreen
    private void
    manageImgTouch()
    This method gets the event everytime the icon image is clicked With this method the next scene will be displayed when the user clicks the icon
    private void
    startSplashScreen()
    The main method to call the other methods, import images, add to the Vbox, animation.

  • Method Details

    • manageImgTouch

      private void manageImgTouch()
      This method gets the event everytime the icon image is clicked With this method the next scene will be displayed when the user clicks the icon

    • animateIcon

      private void animateIcon()
      This method modifies an animation with the icon just to give style to the splash screen

    • createImgIconView

      private void createImgIconView() throws FileNotFoundException
      the method imports the icon from the files, assigns to an ImageView to be displayed
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - when the file can not be imported

    • createTitleImgView

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView createTitleImgView() throws FileNotFoundException
      This method imports the title image, assigns it to a ImageView to be displayed on the screen
      Returns:
      the imageView of the title to display it on the screen
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - everytime the file can not be imported

    • startSplashScreen

      private void startSplashScreen() throws FileNotFoundException
      The main method to call the other methods, import images, add to the Vbox, animation.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - everytime the file can not be imported
